categories: Category:Star Wars: The New Jedi Order

nodes.text: The New Jedi Order: Balance Point (American Foundation for the Blind audiobook)

The New Jedi Order: Balance Point is the unabridged audiobook version of the Star Wars Legends novel of the same name, by author Kathy Tyers. The audiobook was performed by Erik Sandvold and released by American Foundation for the Blind in 2007.
